Articles.Content: Can anyone give me the rough estimate for the isa map sat range, if it helps, I'm using 3.3.4

I have recently mapped Duna and Eve for ISA and Kethane. I did not write done the altitudes but roughly if memory serves - under 300k - 250k for ISA and under 250k-200k for Kethane. Duna ISA screenshot includes the height AGL. My other screenshots have this covered by the map. Mapping speed 50x in both cases.

BJ Quest

Edited May 27, 2013 by BJ Quest
added info.
